oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Reunion Ribbons of the United Confederate Veterans
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: These ribbons are from the United Confederate Veterans Reunions in Louisville, Kentucky in 1900 and from Nashville, Tennessee in 1904. The center ribbon is a unit ribbon from Co. C, 24th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. The original veteran who owned these ribbons remains unknown.
